installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

apt update
apt -y install curl git jq

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server/

# Hard coded latest version as the magma API doesn't have an endpoint to query for it
LATEST_VERSION="1.18.2"

# Default TAG_VERSION if empty
if [[ -z "${TAG_VERSION}" ]]; then
    TAG_VERSION="latest"
fi


if [[ -z "${MC_VERSION}" ]] || [[ "${MC_VERSION}" == "latest" ]]; then
    echo -e "Version not set. Defaulting to latest"
    MC_VERSION=${LATEST_VERSION}
fi

echo "Attempting to install Magma - Version ${MC_VERSION} - Tag ${TAG_VERSION}"

if [[ "${TAG_VERSION}" == "latest" ]]; then
    # Didn't ask for a specific tag
    VERSION_JSON=$(curl --silent "https://api.magmafoundation.org/api/v2/${MC_VERSION}/latest")
else
    # Asked for a specific tag
    VERSION_JSON=$(curl --silent "https://api.magmafoundation.org/api/v2/${MC_VERSION}/latest/${TAG_VERSION}")
fi

DOWNLOAD_LINK=$(echo ${VERSION_JSON} | jq -r .link)
echo "Download Link: '${DOWNLOAD_LINK}'"

# Check we found a download link
if [ ! -z "${DOWNLOAD_LINK}" ]; then
    
    # Validate that link works
    echo -e "Validating download link"
    if curl --output /dev/null --silent --head --fail ${DOWNLOAD_LINK}; then
        echo -e "link is valid. setting download link to ${DOWNLOAD_LINK}"
        DOWNLOAD_LINK=${DOWNLOAD_LINK}
    else
        echo -e "Download URL ${DOWNLOAD_LINK} is invalid. Terminating install."
        exit 2
    fi
else
    echo -e "No download URL found. Terminating install."
    exit 2
fi


# Download server.jar
echo -e "running: curl -sSL -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} ${DOWNLOAD_LINK}"
curl -sSL -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} -sSL ${DOWNLOAD_LINK}
echo -e "Install Complete"
